kpi.name: c1391

kpi_info.title: dur_inter_papu_3g2g_max
kpi_info.use: Maximum event duration for inter PAPU 3G to 2G inter system handover procedure. Duration is calculated in Mobility Management and it is the time between ISHO Request and ISHO Accept messages.

kpi.kpi_alias: Duration of succ inter papu 3G to 2G system ho maximum
